fullText: That tonal balance is delicate, and it could tilt in any number of directions: too grim and it might be impossible to watch (I would understand someone not wanting to engage with the premise), too woo-woo and it might become sentimental. It asks a lot, specifically, of the actress playing Mary Jane. Rachel McAdams turns out to be more than up for the task.

keyPhrases.quote: Rachel McAdams turns out to be more than up for the task
It asks a lot, specifically, of the actress playing Mary Jane
too grim and it might be impossible to watch

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: This excerpt praises McAdams' performance strongly but acknowledges the show's tonal challenges and difficulty of the material, suggesting qualified approval.
